backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, listings, lobbies, and matches with access-controlled CRUD operations and sorting/filtering utilities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference or build planning.
frontend/index.css: Root Tailwind CSS file defining OKLCH-based theme variables and dark-mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML template loading the React application entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app defining TanStack Router routes and global providers including theme, profile setup, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Auth guard component showing a sign‑in prompt for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/background/CowNe: Three.js component rendering a fading neon motion trail behind a moving 3D point.
frontend/src/components/background/Flyin: Animated PBR‑textured flying cow model with circular motion and neon trail effects.
frontend/src/components/background/Meteo: Spawns falling meteors that explode into short‑lived confetti particles, updating positions each frame. Renders both meteors and fading confetti meshes.
frontend/src/components/background/NeonB: Wraps children with a WebGL‑based neon background, using lazy‑loaded 3D scene, error boundary, and fallback for non‑WebGL environments.
frontend/src/components/background/NeonS: Defines the full 3D neon space scene with stars, clouds, objects, lights, fog, and hue cycling. Renders multiple animated fields and effects inside a Three.js Canvas.
Generates moving neon‑colored stars with twinkling sizes and updates their positions each frame. Reports current star positions to a parent callback.
frontend/src/components/background/Pengu: Periodically fires projectiles from penguin positions, updating movement and rendering fading smoke trails. Removes shots after a short lifespan.
frontend/src/components/background/Pixel: Creates drifting, rotating pixel‑style cloud planes using a tiled texture. Clouds loop horizontally and animate based on speedMultiplier.
frontend/src/components/background/StarE: Spawns expanding rainbow ring explosions at star positions and updates shader‑driven animation until they fade out. Cleans up meshes when completed.
frontend/src/components/background/UfoFi: Renders rotating UFO meshes and periodically spawns fading glint particles in a Three.js scene.
frontend/src/components/background/useNe: Computes a smoothly interpolated neon color based on elapsed time cycling through a fixed palette.
frontend/src/components/images/ImageUrlF: Empty placeholder file for image URL input components.
frontend/src/components/images/SafeImage: Empty placeholder file for a safe image display component.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Displays footer with current year and a caffeinated attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with logo, navigation links, login button, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Page layout wrapping header, footer, and routed content inside a neon background layer.
frontend/src/components/listings/Listing: Empty placeholder for a listing card component.
Empty placeholder for listing filter UI.
Empty placeholder for a listing creation/edit form.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter a name and create their profile.
frontend/src/components/start/NeonStartC: Animated canvas shimmer overlay on top of a neon cover image with gradient shading.
frontend/src/components/start/NeonStartS: Legacy animated 2D canvas scene with moving sprites and pulsing effects; kept for reference.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudioContextM: Manages Web Audio music playback, loading, context unlocking, looping, and reactive volume control.
frontend/src/game/audio/useAudioContextS: React hook creating an AudioContext and custom synthesized SFX (hiss, boing, laser) with throttling and cleanup.
frontend/src/game/audio/useBeatClock.ts: Hook that tracks beat timing using AudioContext time and updates a beat phase via RAF scheduling.
Empty placeholder file for future chiptune loop hook.
frontend/src/game/audio/useMusicTrack.ts: Hook managing looping background music playback, volume, and mute state using an HTMLAudioElement.
frontend/src/game/audio/useSfx.ts: Hook for playing cached WAV SFX with throttling and optional stereo panning via Web Audio.
frontend/src/game/constants.ts: Defines grid, gameplay, scoring, spawn intervals, and planet configuration constants.
frontend/src/game/hooks/useGameLoop.ts: Large hook controlling game state, rendering, timing, obstacles, snakes, and intensity calculations.
frontend/src/game/render/canvasDpr.ts: Utilities for setting up high-DPI canvas scaling and retrieving logical canvas size.
frontend/src/game/render/entities.ts: Rendering functions for snakes and crocodiles with beat-synced and time‑based animation effects.
frontend/src/game/render/obstacles.ts: Rendering functions for obstacles like UFOs and cows, including beat‑synced motion, glow, and textures.
frontend/src/game/render/sprites.ts: Optional sprite loading system with no‑op loading and helper functions for drawing sprite images.
frontend/src/game/render/starfield.ts: Renders a starfield background with twinkling stars and periodic shooting stars using canvas.
frontend/src/game/render/toonMaterials.t: Loads toon-style texture assets and defines material presets with colors, outlines, and glow settings.
frontend/src/game/render/toonRenderer.ts: Provides high-level toon rendering utilities including glow, outlines, gradients, and quality controls.
frontend/src/game/render/vfx.ts: Implements visual effects for lasers, explosions, and score popups using toon rendering.
frontend/src/game/skins/catalog.ts: Defines a catalog of snake skins with IDs, names, descriptions, and color palettes.
frontend/src/game/types.ts: Declares core game types including snakes, obstacles, power-ups, lasers, explosions, and game state.
frontend/src/game/ui/ControlsHintOverlay: UI overlay displaying control hints for keyboard, mobile, and gamepad inputs.
frontend/src/game/ui/GameHUD.tsx: HUD component showing score, level, eliminations, planet, and gravity mode.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Provides the authenticated user's identity, profile, and login state using Internet Identity and user profile queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useDocumentVisibility: Tracks whether the browser tab is currently visible.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing identity, login, logout, and status using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving the caller's user profile via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind-based neon theme styles, including colors, fonts, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/audio/AudioDir: Controls audio intensity states and triggers sound events based on gameplay intensity.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/input/useAnalo: Handles analog input from keyboard and joystick, providing movement, acceleration, brake, and shake states.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/input/VirtualJ: Implements a touch-based virtual joystick that feeds normalized input to the analog input system.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/MotorSnakeGame: Sets up the 3D game canvas, game systems, HUD, inputs, and update loop for the MotorSnake game.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/multiplayer/Mu: Provides a bridge for submitting and receiving multiplayer actions, currently with placeholder logic.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/render/PlayerS: Renders the player snake head and tail meshes and updates their positions and emissive pulse animations each frame.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/render/SphereW: Draws the animated spherical world environment with breathing surfaces, pulsing core, shadow decals, and optional abyss tentacles.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/state/gameStat: Defines the Zustand game state store including player, world, enemies, anomalies, power-ups, and associated mutation actions.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Anomal: Spawns anomalies periodically and manages active power-up effects like blackhole suction and shooting star behavior.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Collis: Handles player collisions with enemies, anomalies, and the core, triggering effects, removing entities, and applying power-ups.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/EnemyS: Periodically spawns random enemies and updates their positions based on velocity.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Enviro: Controls gravity cycling, acid rain damage, wind portals, and fog intensity, triggering related visual effects.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/GhostS: Manages ghost activation after death and increases ghost influence until player replacement triggers.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/Player: Updates player movement using analog input, gravity scaling, penguin slowdowns, and optional aggressive motion effects.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/TailSy: Updates tail segments to follow the player, handles whip impulse and shaking to remove baby penguins, and supports segment removal.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/systems/WorldS: Constrains the player to inner or outer sphere surfaces, manages abyss mode pull and respawn, and toggles world mode.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/DebugSpawnP: UI panel for spawning enemies and anomalies with quick buttons and showing baby penguin count.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/DebugWorldC: UI controls for toggling world mode and triggering a temporary core break/abyss event.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/Environment: Adjusts gravity and fog, toggles shield, and triggers short acid rain events via UI.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/GhostOverla: Displays ghost influence HUD and temporary subtitle when ghost mode activates.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/ui/PowerUpStat: Shows active power‑up name, progress bar, warning text, and remaining duration.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/effects/Co: Renders a short‑lived confetti particle burst with gravity and fade-out, cleaning resources on finish.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/effects/Di: Spawns a glint plane moving in a direction, fading over time, and facing the camera.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/effects/Pi: Renders a moving pink smoke trail by interpolating between two positions and fading sphere meshes over a short lifetime.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/effects/Ra: Displays an expanding, fading rainbow ring billboarded to the camera, disposing its geometry and material when finished.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/useCameraS: Provides a hook to trigger temporary camera shake by randomly offsetting the camera position with decay.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/VfxBus.ts: Simple event bus for triggering and subscribing to VFX events with timestamps.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/VfxLayer3D: Subscribes to VFX events and renders corresponding 3D effects, adding shake on eat hits.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/VfxScreenO: Displays a brief full‑screen color-wave overlay when eat-hit events occur.
frontend/src/motorSnake3d/vfx/vfxSprites: Loads and caches VFX textures and exposes paths for several sprite assets.
frontend/src/multiplayer/useLobby.ts: Implements lobby creation, joining, leaving, and match starting with react-query polling for waiting lobbies.
Handles match actions and match state polling plus a mutation for submitting player actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page showing hero section, navigation buttons, and feature cards for the game.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Displays a mock leaderboard with ranked entries and placeholders for user scores.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Lobby interface enabling solo play, lobby creation, and joining existing lobbies with authentication checks.
frontend/src/pages/PlayPage.tsx: Main gameplay page handling audio unlock, play/pause, mute, intensity, VFX triggers, and rendering the game container with navigation controls.
frontend/src/pages/SellListingPage.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/pages/SkinsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of snake skins with ownership state, previews, and equip buttons, using static placeholders for now.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and manipulating hash-based query strings.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining custom colors, fonts, animations, shadows, and content paths for the project.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing requirements for generating and integrating a new animated neon cover image and related features.
